So, rumination disorder or rumination syndrome is an unusual type of eating problem...
...that's somewhat related to bulimic type eating problems...
...part of what they've eaten at the course of a meal or a snack.
The food spontaneously regurgitates into the mouth...
...and the person with rumination syndrome then either spits it out or reswallows the food.
We don't know everything about how to treat rumination syndrome when it emerges.
There are some strategies that can be employed, psychotherapy strategies,...
